name: auto-ml
description: AutoML integration containing both the backend (Python) and frontend (TypeScript)

scripts.postinstall: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ui && npm install
scripts.serve: concurrently 'FLASK_APP=server.py FLASK_DEBUG=1 python -u -m flask run' 'cd ui && npm run start' 'rabbitmq-server' 'celery -E -A worker -c 1 worker' 'sleep 15s && open http://localhost:4200'

author: Samer Albahra
